content: these socks are super cozy quick and easy to knit it s a toe-up sock and the texture begins in the toe section this pattern could be a good pattern to knit the first socks **important** this pattern is now being tested if you have any questions or doubts don t hesitate to contact me **sizes** s m l s women s size with small foot m women s size with medium foot l women s size with big foot or men with medium foot
